New class

Fill this form to schedule a new class. Doing so will deploy a smart-contract on the ethereum blockchain. Afterwards you'll have a link to share the class with your students.

Those signing up will have to deposit a fee. That fee will be returned to them if they attend. If not, it goes into the no-show wallet address.


Tip: put in a charity wallet address
